question_text: Which of the following describes a key tradeoff when using a wireless Bluetooth headset instead of a wired headset?
answer_options: Bluetooth headsets have better sound quality by default
Wireless headsets always support analog input
Wireless headsets require their own power source
Wired headsets are not compatible with mobile devices
correct_answer: Wireless headsets require their own power source
explanation: Bluetooth headsets need battery power to function, while wired headsets typically draw power from the device.
